fadeScreen({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:0}); // unused=0
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

ops.raw: a5 00 00 f4 ff 9b f3 d7 fc 4e 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:0}); // Rufus
“So, I finally found you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // Rufus
“But, I'll be the one who gets it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Heidegger
“This is the Promised Land
the President had been searching for!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Scarlet
“Kyaa haa hah.”{PAUSE}“haa hah”{PAUSE}“haa…hah”{PAUSE}“This is incredible…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Hojo
“That land is no one's.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // Hojo
“It's where the Reunion will take place…
They will all gather here…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // Hojo
“I wonder if we'll see…Sephiroth?”
